channel.title: How do I block all files in a client?
channel.description: Hey guys I was planning on putting my server online for players but I must know how to block, (or even hide would be okay), all the files in the client. I've played many servers and everytime i've downloaded theirs, it's like the only thing you see once you open the client is a Run.bat. If you guys have absolutly any link to this tutorial or any easy explanation, just give me it. Thanks ;D ;D

item.title: How do I block all files in a client?
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

accually i found a java decompiler which i used to get the java files from the class files and it works fine soo that doesnt work and the java decompiler is from java.com

Read full topic
item.source: How do I block all files in a client?

item.title: How do I block all files in a client?
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

All you have to do is compile your client. Make sure it runs fine. Then delete every .java file. Simple as that. It will still work, and they can’t change your clients details.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I block all files in a client?
